____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables disassembly of static weapons. Could be applied to local [[player]], to another unit or to static weapon directly. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''enableWeaponDisassembly''' enable </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to prevent local [[player]] from being able to disassemble static weapons </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> entity '''enableWeaponDisassembly''' enable </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> entity: [[Object]] - unit or static weapon </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]  - [[false]] to prevent a unit from being able to disassemble static weapons, or to prevent a static weapon from being disassembled by anyone </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[enableWeaponDisassembly]] [[false]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
